General.Name: Elec-Tech International Co Ltd
General.Description: Elec-Tech International Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells small household appliances and LED products in China and internationally. Its household appliances include coffee machines, wall breakers, frying machines, electric ovens, and other western-style small household appliances. The company's LED products includes upstream chips and epitaxial wafers, component display modules, and downstream application products; midstream packaging devices, such as lighting devices, display devices, indicating devices, and LED backlight modules; and LED chips. It offers its products primarily under the ETi brand name. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Zhuhai, China.
